document_data.mainbody:
Lizel was a vendor employed by Master Velsin in Sundabar in 1373 DR.
In 1373 DR, Aliisza, while in disguise, saw Lizel treated rudely by Yrudis Gregan and somehow sensed that her father, a city guard, was killed some nights before by some tanarukk. Later in the House of the Triad, Tauran allowed Alissza inside Lizels mind. She discovered that she was a follower of Ilmater and had two younger sisters, Kaiga and Sadil, who needed new clothes.
